channel.description: Recent content in Chicago on Music

item.title: Chicago - 25 OR 6 TO 4
item.description:
Waiting for
the break of day
Searching for
something to say-
Flashing lights
against the sky-
Giving up
I close my eyes–
Sitting cross legged
on the floor
Twenty five or
six to four-

Staring blindly
into space
Getting up to splash
my face
Wanting just
to stay wake-
Wond’ring how much
I can take—
Should I try
to do some more
Twenty five or
six to four–

Feeling like
I ought to sleep—
Spinning room
is sinking deep-
Searching for
something to say-
Waiting for
the break of day—
Twenty five or
six to four
Twenty five or
six to four–
